name: Party_Formation_Top
text: Select the Style, equipment, formation or inherited skill/spell you wish to change.

name: Party_Style_Change
text: Tap the Style you want to change, then tap the Confirm button.

name: Party_Equipment_Change
text: Tap the equipment slot (Weapon, Armor, Gear, or Accessory) you want to change and the piece of equipment you want to use, then tap the Confirm button.

name: Party_Arrangement_Change
text: Select the character whose position you want to change.

name: Party_Formation_Change
text: Select the formation you want to use.

name: Party_InheritSkill_Change
text: Change the amplification status or BP cost and check abilities.

name: SkillAwake_BaseStyle_Choice
text: Select the Style whose skills or spells you want to awaken.

name: SkillAwake_MasteryfinishedSkill_Choice
text: Select the skill or spell you want to awaken.

name: SkillAwake_MasteryPendingSkill_Choice
text: Select the skill or spell you want to awaken.

name: Player_FavoriteStyle_Set
text: Select a Style to set as your favorite.

name: StyleBreakthrough_Style_Choice
text: Select the Style whose level cap you want to unlock.

name: StyleGrow_Style_Buildup
text: Hold the Enhance Style button to use experience points to raise the Style's level.

name: StyleGrow_Style_Choice
text: Select the Style you want to enhance.

name: Item_Sell_Choice
text: Select the items you want to sell. Tap the Sell All button to sell all selected items.

name: Smith_GrowMaterial_Choice
text: Select Enhancement Materials you wish to use, then press Enhance button.

name: Smith_AfterEvolve_Choice
text: Select an evolution path.

name: Smith_ForkEvolve_Choice
text: Select an evolution path.

name: Smith_EvolveMaterial_Choice
text: Selected materials can be converted into their higher-rank counterparts.

name: Smith_EquipmentGrow_Choice
text: Select equipment.

name: Smith_EquipmentSell_Choice
text: Select the equipment you want to sell.

name: PresentBox_Present_Top
text: Unclaimed presents will be automatically deleted 30 days after delivery to the present box.

name: StyleLimitbreak_Style_Choice
text: Select the Style whose level cap you want to unlock.

name: StyleLimitbreak_Style_Limitbreak
text: Tap the Unlock Level Cap button to spend Style Pieces and unlock the Style's level cap. If you don't have enough of a Style's pieces, universal Style Pieces (gold, silver, or bronze) can be used instead.

name: Expedition_Character_Choice
text: Select characters to send on the Expedition.

name: Lesson_Style_Choice
text: Select the Style that you want to train.

name: Lesson_Style_Energy
text: Replenish your energy (NRG) supply and select characters to begin training.

name: Item_Sell_All
text: Select multiple items and tap the Sell All button to exchange the items for aurum.

name: Expedition_Place_Choice
text: Select an Expedition destination. Recommended attributes and items that can be obtained vary depending on location.

name: StyleSummon_piece_Choice
text: You can exchange specific Style Pieces to obtain that Style.

name: uradojo_Place_Choice
text: Tap the Death Match button to start a Death Match.

name: uranoryokukaihou_Skill_Choice
text: Select the icon for the Hidden Attribute whose cap you want to unlock.

name: uranoryokukaihou_Style_Choice
text: Select the Style whose Hidden Attribute caps you wish to unlock.

name: dressup_Style_Choice
text: Only Styles with available skins will be displayed. Select the Style whose skin you want to change.

name: dressup_Character_Choice
text: Only skins that have been obtained will be displayed.

name: Holy_Stone_Sell_Choice
text: Select Holy Stone.

name: Holy_Stone_Set_Choice
text: Select equipment to set the Holy Stone in.

name: SkillMastery_BaseStyle_Choice
text: Select the Style whose skills or spells you want to amplify.

name: SkillMastery_MasteryfinishedSkill_Choice
text: Select the skill or spell you want to amplify.

name: FarthestParty_Formation_Top
text: Select the Style, equipment, formation or inherited skill/spell you wish to change.

name: FarthestParty_set_Top
text: Select and set the party you wish to take on Well quests from Final Battle parties.

name: FavoriteArmor_set_Top
text: Tap the list to go to Edit Favorites.

name: Smith_equipment_craft_Top
text: Use materials to forge equipment.

name: Shodan_Style_Choice
text: Select the Style whose Dojo Rank you wish to promote.

name: Shodan_Character_Rankup
text: Consume specific items and Style Enhancement EXP to promote the Dojo Rank of a character.

name: main_quest_Choice
text: Select the Main Quest to take on.

name: Theatre_Museum_Top
text: Tap on the screen to zoom in on the image.

name: Smith_EquipmentGrowEvolve_Choice
text: Select equipment.

name: Theatre_BattleCustom_Choice_Ally
text: Tap on the Style you wish to use. Tap Confirm to confirm change, or tap Remove to remove Style from party.

name: Theatre_BattleCustom_Choice_Enemy
text: Tap on the enemy you wish to use. Tap Confirm to confirm change, or tap Remove to remove the enemy.

name: Theatre_BattleCustom_Choice_Skill
text: Tap on the skill/spell you wish to use. Tap Confirm to confirm change.

name: Theatre_BattleCustom_Choice_BG
text: Tap on the background you wish to use. Tap Confirm to confirm change.

name: Theatre_BattleCustom_Choice_Formation
text: Select positions you wish to swap. Tap Confirm to confirm change.

name: Smith_Evolve_confirm
text: Tap Evolve to do one evolution. Tap 1-Tap Enhance to move to the 1-Tap Enhance screen.
